algoblock.name: AlgoBlock
algoblock.description: AlgoBlock is a online company dedicated to making stock trading simpler. This allows users to use drop-down menus to create a trading strategy and converts these drop-downs into code. Users can then run that code to trade stocks automatically.

spider_robot.name: Spider Robot
spider_robot.description: Made up of 12 servos and 14 3D-printed parts, this mechanical spider can walk forward or backward, and turn left or right. It also has a Bluetooth chip, so it can be controlled by a laptop connected to the spider via Bluetooth.

problemstart.name: ProblemStart
problemstart.description: This project was my first major freelance gig. This platform connects business owners facing a problem with vendors who are offering solutions. It has payment processing, LinkedIn verification, reviews, a search engine, and a messaging system in the app.

computer_vision_workout.name: Computer Vision Workout
computer_vision_workout.description: This project uses computer vision to track your body and count your reps for curls, push-ups, and squats. This can help ensure that you reach the appropriate depth for each rep, and count your reps for you so that you can focus on your workout.

svp_demo.name: SVP Demo
svp_demo.description: For my internship at Software Velocity Partners, I was tasked with creating a website to show off their new product demo. This allows businesses to upload information about their software, and it will generate tests for the software to ensure that it is fully functional.

envision_ar_demo.name: Envision AR Demo
envision_ar_demo.description:
This demo is for my 3rd-place international DECA project. It uses augmented reality to help customers visualize different products, allowing customers to better understand the products before purchasing them.

You can view the 20-page DECA research paper below.

i.d.e.a._vr_demo.name: I.D.E.A. VR Demo
i.d.e.a._vr_demo.description:
My first DECA project was about bringing virtual reality into education. I created this demo as an example of what a student may experience with virtual reality in a classroom.

You can view the 20-page DECA research paper below.

slaughterhouse_5_game.name: Slaughterhouse 5 Game
slaughterhouse_5_game.description: After reading "Slaughterhouse 5" by Kurt Vonnegut for my English class, I was tasked with creating a creative project for our final exam. My project was a virtual reality game, that takes the user through Billy's adventure through space and time.
